sentences.english: '" Then David crept up unnoticed and cut off a corner of Saul's robe.
sentences.chinese: 大衛就起來，悄悄地割下掃羅外袍的衣襟。

sentences.english: And thou shalt make the robe of the ephod all of blue.
sentences.chinese: 你耀作以弗得的外袍，顏色全是藍的。

sentences.english: And he made the robe of the ephod of woven work, all of blue.
sentences.chinese: 他用織工做以弗得的外袍，顏色全是藍的。

sentences.english: Then you can wear your colored tabard over it that you made earlier.
sentences.chinese: 你可以穿你的顏色在你先前的外袍。

sentences.english: Then David crept up unnoticed and cut off a corner of Saul's robe.
sentences.chinese: 大衛就起來，悄悄地割下掃羅外袍的衣襟。

sentences.english: See, my father, see the corner of your robe in my hand.
sentences.chinese: 我父啊，看看你外袍的衣襟在我手中。

sentences.english: She draped the robe around her daughter's shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 她把外袍披在女兒的肩上。

sentences.english: Then Job arose, and rent his mantle, and shaved his head, and fell down upon the ground, and worshipped
sentences.chinese: 約伯便起來，撕裂外袍，剃了頭，伏在地上下拜。

sentences.english: Make the robe of the ephod entirely of blue cloth.
sentences.chinese: 你要做以弗得的外袍，顏色全是藍的。

sentences.english: See, my father, look at this piece of your robe in my hand!
sentences.chinese: 我父阿，看看你外袍的衣襟在我手中。

sentences.english: A pair of golden seven-pointed stars clasped his billowing cloak at the shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 雙肩上則是一對金色的七芒星勾住他隨風飄揚的外袍。

sentences.english: Make the robe of the ephod entirely of blue cloth
sentences.chinese: 你要做以弗得的外袍，顏色全是藍的。

sentences.english: Please remove only your bra (brassiere) and put on this rob.
sentences.chinese: 請脫下您的胸衣穿上這件外袍。

definition: to take off (trousers)/to drop one's pants
long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
Chinese-style long robe worn as outermost garment/burqa
